name: Hyper-Personalize Email Outreach with AI, Gmail & Google Sheets

values.content:
=Write a professional and friendly email reply to {{ $('Get row(s) in sheet').item.json['First Name'] }} . Their intent is "{{ $('Get row(s) in sheet').item.json.Intent }}". They wrote: "{{ $('Get row(s) in sheet').item.json['Why They Sent Email'] }}". Make the response specific to their message and helpful.No need to add the subject line. Generate in HTML formatting.
The footer signature should be of the following format
Thanks,
{{ $json.sendAs[0].displayName }}

parameters.content:

## ğŸ› ï¸ Prerequisites

Before running this workflow, make sure the following integrations are set up:

1. **Google Account Setup**  
   - Connect your Google account using **Client Credentials**.  
   - Enable the following services:  
     - ğŸ“„ Google Sheets 
     - ğŸ“‚ Google Drive   
     - ğŸ“§ Gmail 

2. **OpenAI Integration**  
   - Add and configure your **OpenAI API Key**.  
   - Required for generating context-aware, personalized email replies.


This will ensure the smooth execution of your personalised email sending workflow
